Reacts to the specified conversation message

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":""}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"reaction_id":{"type":"integer","description":"ID of the reaction to use. Use the current reaction ID to undo."}},"required":["reaction_id"]}},"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"reaction_id":{"type":"integer","description":"ID of the reaction to use. Use the current reaction ID to undo."}},"required":["reaction_id"]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

>
  
</StatusCodes>
